Reviews.Title: you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: JAMES SANDRIDGE
Reviews.Content: Most likely will request return/refund for these cams; here's my summation:Pros:-at 3.6mm it has the wide angle focal length I was looking for-price is right-super fast delivery-like the way you can angle / adjust viewsCons:-extremely poor color rendention;outside leaves from trees and grass appear magenta/rose; swimming pool looks green when is shoul be blue-resolution very poor, grainyIf you're not concerned with accurate colors or super sharp resolution (ie baby cam or garage came) then this is your cam. Otherwise pay the extra cost for a decent cam.
